name: Potions Room
short_description: Ingredients of every kind line the shelves that fill this room. There is a work-table with a few bubbling cauldrons and opened books on it.
long_description: The room is filled with shelves that hold ingredients of every kind, from dried flowers to moon dust. There is a work-table upon which sit a few bubbling cauldrons and books laid open to specific pages.

cherry door.description: This aged cherry door has a copper keyhole.

teal gem.description: A curious teal-colored gemstone. It is a little smaller than your palm and sparkles beautifully. It has a mysterious glow.

potion rack.description: A rack holding bottles for storing potions. Most of them seem cracked, unfortunately.

blue potion.description: A vial filled with blue liquid. Other than it's unusual color, there is nothing odd about it. A label on the side tells you not to drink this.

green potion.description: A vial of some kind of green liquid. Just by holding it you feel it emanating some sort of energy. You shouldn't drink this.

empty potion bottle.description: An empty vial capable of holding potions.

annoyed stern-looking ghost.description: This ghost looks quite annoyed about something. He has a very authoritative look about him as well.

stern-looking ghost.description: The authoritative-looking Chief of Ghostly Staff seems a little less annoyed now. Maybe.
